Name: Commercial / Jingle / Trailer
Definition: A short piece of music created for an advertisement, to introduce a programme, or to act as punctuation.

Name: Film
Definition: A work originally composed for use in a film production.

Name: General Usage
Definition: A work originally composed for general usage

Name: Library Work
Definition: A work recorded for use primarily in audio-visual productions or broadcasts.

Name: Multimedia
Definition: A work originally composed for use within a multimedia production not intended for broadcast. Examples: CDI, CD-ROM.

Name: Radio
Definition: A work specifically created for use in a radio production.

Name: Television
Definition: A work specifically created for use in a television production.

Name: Theatre
Definition: A work specifically created for use in a theatrical production.

Name: Video
Definition: A work specifically created for use in a video production.
